translations: 发霉的；落伍的；冷淡的（musty 的变形）

sentences.sentence: “When challenged, he was clever enough to say, for example, that he had made a mistake,” says Jean-Pierre Mustier, the head of SocGen's investment-banking arm.
sentences.translation: 兴业的投资银行业务部主管Jean-Pierre Mustier说，“每当被质问，他总是机灵地回答，比如，他犯了一个错误。”

sentences.sentence: "When challenged, he was clever enough to say, for example, that he had made a mistake," says Jean-Pierre Mustier, the head of SocGen's investment-banking arm.
sentences.translation: 兴业的投资银行业务部主管Jean - Pierre Mustier说，“每当被质问，他总是机灵地回答，比如，他犯了一个错误。”
